name: Appsus
description: This app is a clone of Gmail and Google Keep combined into one convenient package. It allows you to manage your email and notes all in one place, making it easy to stay organized and on top of your tasks.

name: Mister tasker
description: A priority-queue for tasks, using MongoDB task collection, in this app, the server provides an API for task management (CRUDL) with a real-time interaction!

name: Stayby
description: Stayby, A pixel perfect web app built with Vue.js v3 inspired by the website Airbnb.com , a marketplace website for hiring and hosting a place to sleep with rich of features such as searching, dashboard page, filtering support, wishlist, trips and more...
